meanings.sent1: My padre taught me how to ride a bike.
meanings.sent2: Every child loves their padre unconditionally.
meanings.sent3: When my little sister called our dog 'padre,' we all burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: His wisdom and guidance make him the padre of our family.
meanings.sent5: The image of a strong and caring padre is etched in my memory.

meanings.sent1: The padre led the congregation in prayer.

meanings.sent3: The mischievous child tried to prank the sleeping padre during the sermon.
meanings.sent4: In times of need, people turn to the padre for comfort and solace.
meanings.sent5: The solemn presence of the padre in the church creates a sense of peace.
